requirements: Enrollment limited to first-year students. Preregistration required; see under First-Year Seminar Program.
description:
Exploration of the natural history of southern New England, with specific focus on areas in and around New Haven. Pertinent environmental issues, such as climate change, endangered species, and the role of glacial and human history in shaping vegetative patterns and processes, are approached from a multi-disciplinary framework and within the context of the surrounding landscape.Â 
Enrollment limited to first-year students. Preregistration required; see under First-Year Seminar Program.
title: The New England Forest
